titleStmt.title: The Perpetval crosse, or, Passion of Iesvs Christ from the first instant of his incarnation to the last of his life / set forth in fourtie pictures for the greater profite of soules.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at Antwerp by Cornelius Woons ...,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages stained with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Emanuel College Library, Cambridge University.
